com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api.math

Class Matrix44

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api.math.Matrix44

  • public class Matrix44
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents 4x4 matrix of floats.

    Matrix holds it's values in an array storing columns of the matrix. This array is returned by getValues() method.

    Order of values in the backing array: m[0] m[4] m[8] m[12] m[1] m[5] m[9] m[13] m[2] m[6] m[10] m[14] m[3] m[7] m[11] m[15]

    For vector transformation Matrix uses the convention of column vector on the right side of the multiplication.

    All operations performed on this matrix are equal to multiplying this matrix from left with the matrix containing the appropriate operation.
